Subject: Re: Cybertronian Fire - i'll eat your heart
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Headstrong/Tantrum/Sinnertwin

Sinnertwin just jumped towards the fallend First Aid, unknowingly doging
the blasts from Groove. As he fell towards first aid, one head snarled, and
the other spoke, "We'll rip out your slagging fuel pump, and EAT IT", both
mouths wide opend, he decended on his foe.

Headstrong got his legs taken out from under him, by the force of the shot
to the torso. He tried to roll away from the searing blast of flame from
Hot Spot, but was not very successful. He stood up, his front all charred,
and he pulled out his sword, and Plasma blaster. As soon as he thouched his
sword, his figuere became hollow, and four more joined it, standing side by
side. "SNORT* Lucky shot Autobot, but you won't *Snort* do it again" he
said, firing three large burst of light balls from his gun.

Tantrum landed near Rampage, and Transformed. "Here, refuel" he said, as
one of his tanks opened for Rampage to dring from. While he did this he
fired on Groove with his horns.
